channel.title: Pages on Syniti Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Syniti Documentation

item.title: API Ping Agent
item.description: API Ping Agent Use this page to test the BackOffice IGC Connector Agent connection to DSP. To access this page, navigate to Agent Interface > Configuration > APIs > API Ping Agent in the Navigation pane Field Description Ping Agent Click to check the BackOffice IGC Connector Agent connection to the DSP. Base URL Displays the RESTServer address for the BackOffice IGC Agent.

item.title: API Status Log
item.description: API Status Log This page is used by the BackOffice Support team while troubleshooting issues related to API calls.

item.title: Data Quality Report Assignment
item.description: Data Quality Report Assignment Use this page to Configure the IGC Migration dashboard. To access this page: Select Agent Interface > Dashboards > Migration Dashboard in the Navigation pane. Click the Data Quality Report Assignment icon for a wave.

item.title: Parameters
item.description: Parameters Use this page to add the BackOffice IGC Connector Agent URL in DSP. To access this page, navigate to Agent Interface > Configuration > Parameters in the Navigation pane.

item.title: Wave Identification H
item.description: Wave Identification H Wave Identification V Use this page to Configure the Migration dashboard. To access this page, select Agent Interface > Dashboards > Migration Dashboard in the Navigation pane. Wave Identification V Wave Identification H Field Description General Wave ID Displays the name of the active wave. Click the wave name to open the Waves page for that wave in Console. Description Displays a description of the wave as entered on the Waves page.

item.title: Wave Milestones H
item.description: Wave Milestones H Wave Milestones V Use this page to Configure the IGC Migration dashboard. To access this page: Select Agent Interface > Dashboards > Migration Dashboard in the Navigation pane. Click the Milestones icon for a wave. Wave Milestones V Wave Milestones H Field Description Delete Click to delete the milestone. The milestone is removed from the Migration dashboard. NOTE: The Start Date and End Date milestones cannot be deleted.
